item.title: Arxiv Paper
item.description: Arxiv Papers: LLM meets Copyright # 2024-03-18 TPLLM: A Traffic Prediction Framework Based on Pretrained Large Language Models Yilong Ren, Yue Chen, Shuai Liu, Boyue Wang, Haiyang Yu, Zhiyong Cui abstract abstract: Traffic prediction constitutes a pivotal facet within the purview ofIntelligent Transportation Systems (ITS), and the attainment of highly precisepredictions holds profound significance for efficacious traffic management. Theprecision of prevailing deep learning-driven traffic prediction modelstypically sees an upward trend with a rise in the volume of training data.
